item.description:
This is an informal group meeting weekly (see Calendar for dates, times, and directions). We discuss and study A Course In Miracles, teachings focused on remembering our oneness with God in the present moment and releasing ourselves and others from thoughts of duality and judgment. As the Course says, this is one of many paths towards truth and wholeness.  We focus each group on a reading, video, or audio selection related to the Course, discuss it's meaning for our own spiritual paths, and try to support one another in life's journey. Please think of joining us whether you are brand new to the Course or a veteran student. All are welcome. Call Theresa, (860) 338-3922, for more information.

 

Other A Course in Miracles groups in the area:

West Hartford, Thursday evenings, Ed Spath, (860) 233-0083

Meriden and South Windsor, Rev. Casey Roberts, (203) 315-9201

Newington, Monday Evenings, Mark Rubenstein, (860) 459-9280
